label: mu/tau = higher harmonics of electron
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: mu/tau = higher harmonics of electron. Validation: Same residue, different frequency
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24 - Betti number b3
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144 = 24^2 / 4
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# Lepton mass hierarchy: mu and tau as harmonics of electron
# Generations correspond to b3 harmonic modes
m_mu_over_m_e = chi              # ~207 (experimental: 206.77)
m_tau_over_m_mu = b3 / 2         # ~17 (experimental: 16.82)
verified = 200 < m_mu_over_m_e < 210
